addLiquidity(address,uint256,uint256,(ui.details: see return description of _addLiquidityif quote.sellToken is neither target nor underlying, it will be swapped for underlying on 0x and wrapped into the target

params.mode: 0 = issues and sell YT, 1 = issue and hold YT
params.params: AddLiquidityParams struct with the params for the addLiquidity call
params.permit: Permit to pull the tokens to swap from

combine(address,uint256,uint256,address,.details: if quote.buyToken is neither target nor underlying, it will unwrap target and swap it on 0x

params.permit: Permit to pull PT and YT
params.receiver: Address where the resulting Target will be transferred
params.uBal: Amount of PT and YT to burn

returns.amt: Amount of tokens received from reconstituting target

deployAdapter(address,address,bytes).details: Called by external address, deploy a new Adapter via an Adapter Factory

params.data: Additional encoded data needed to deploy the adapter

issue(address,uint256,uint256,address,((.details: The balance of PTs and YTs minted will be the same value in units of underlying (less fees)if quote.sellToken is neither target nor underlying, it will swap on 0x and wrap to target and swap it on 0x

params.maturity: Maturity date for the Series [unix time]
params.receiver: Address where the resulting PTs and YTs will be transferred to

returns.uBal: Amount of PTs and YTs minted

onboardAdapter(address,bool).details: Called by a trusted address, approves Target for issuance, and onboards adapter to the Divider

params.addAdapter: Whether to call divider.addAdapter or not (useful e.g when upgrading Periphery)

removeLiquidity(address,uint256,uint256,.details: More info on `minAmountsOut`: https://github.com/balancer-labs/docs-developers/blob/main/resources/joins-and-exits/pool-exits.md#minamountsoutif quote.buyToken is neither target nor underlying, it will unwrap target and swap it on 0x if quote.buyToken is PT, it will return target and PTs

params.lpBal: Balance of LP tokens to provide
params.params: RemoveLiquidityParams struct with the params for the removeLiquidity call
params.permit: Permit to pull the LP tokens
params.swapPTs: Whether to swap PTs or not. If false, it will transfer PTs to the user

returns.amt: amount of tokens received and ptBal PTs (in case it's called after maturity and redeem is restricted or intoTarget is false)

params.isOn: Flag setting this factory to enabled or disabled

params.newSpaceFactory: The Space Factory addresss to set

sponsorSeries(address,uint256,bool).details: Called by an external address, initializes a new series in the Divider

params.adapter: Adapter to associate with the Series
params.maturity: Maturity date for the Series, in units of unix time
params.withPool: Whether to deploy a Space pool or not (only works for unverified adapters)

sponsorSeries(address,uint256,bool,(((ad.details: Called by an external address, initializes a new series in the Divider

params.adapter: Adapter to associate with the Series
params.maturity: Maturity date for the Series, in units of unix time
params.permit: Permit to pull the tokens to swap from
params.withPool: Whether to deploy a Space pool or not (only works for unverified adapters)

swapForPTs(address,uint256,uint256,uint2.details: if quote.sellToken is neither target nor underlying, it will be swapped for underlying on 0x and wrapped into the target

params.permit: Permit to pull the tokens to swap from

swapForYTs(address,uint256,uint256,uint2.details: if quote.sellToken is neither target nor underlying, it will be swapped for underlying on 0x and wrapped into the target

params.permit: Permit to pull the tokens to swap from

swapPTs(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,.details: if quote.buyToken is neither target nor underlying, it will unwrap target and swap it on 0x

params.minAccepted: Min accepted amount of quote.buyToken the user receives

swapYTs(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,.details: if quote.buyToken is neither target nor underlying, it will unwrap target and swap it on 0x

params.minAccepted: Min accepted amount of tokens when selling them on Space

MIN_YT_SWAP_IN().notice: Lower bound on the amount of Claim tokens one can swap in for Target

PRICE_ESTIMATE_ACCEPTABLE_ERROR().notice: Acceptable error when estimating the tokens resulting from a specific swap

combine(address,uint256,uint256,address,.notice: Reconstitute Target by burning PT and YT

issue(address,uint256,uint256,address,((.notice: Mint PTs & YTs of a specific Series

onboardAdapter(address,bool).notice: Onboard a single Adapter w/o needing a factory

removeLiquidity(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: Removes liquidity providing an amount of LP tokens and returns underlying

setSpaceFactory(address).notice: Update the address for the Space Factory

sponsorSeries(address,uint256,bool).notice: Sponsor a new Series in any adapter previously onboarded onto the Divider

sponsorSeries(address,uint256,bool,(((ad.notice: Sponsor a new Series in any adapter previously onboarded onto the Divider

swapForPTs(address,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Swap for PTs of a particular series

swapForYTs(address,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Swap to YTs of a particular series

swapPTs(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,.notice: Swap PTs of a particular series

swapYTs(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,.notice: Swap YTs of a particular series

swapYTsForTarget(address,uint256,uint256.notice: this function is here for backwards compatibility with AutoRoller. It does not suppport the use of `deadline` parameter. Use `swapYTs` instead.
